message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. I'm willing to pay that price for it.
I understand you're interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $140. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I need to make a profit.
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm trying to stay within my budget.

I appreciate your flexibility, Bob! I can see you're serious about getting the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so I'll counter with $130. It's a fair price, and I think you'll find it's worth it.
I'm still interested in the product, but I really think $120 is the maximum I can go. I'm willing to pay that price for it.
